languages.text: "Еще раз попробуешь умничать — отправишься драить нижние палубы. Ты меня понял?"
"Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Еще раз попробуешь умничать — отправишься драить нижние палубы. Ты меня понял?"

traits.locale_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"
"Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

"Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の前でまた利口ぶった口をきいてみろ、アービトレイター。下層デッキの清掃係にしてやる。わかったな？」
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の前でまた利口ぶった口をきいてみろ、アービトレイター。下層デッキの清掃係にしてやる。わかったな？」

languages.text: "Noch so ein Witz, Arbitrator, und ich lasse Euch die unteren Decks schrubben. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Noch so ein Witz, Arbitrator, und ich lasse Euch die unteren Decks schrubben. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: « Si je vous reprends encore une fois à fanfaronner de la sorte, arbitrator, je vous ferai récurer les ponts inférieurs. C'est bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Si je vous reprends encore une fois à fanfaronner de la sorte, arbitrator, je vous ferai récurer les ponts inférieurs. C'est bien clair ? »

languages.text: «Vuelva a hacerse el gracioso conmigo, Arbitrator, y lo pondré a fregar las cubiertas inferiores. ¿Ha quedado claro?».
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «Vuelva a hacerse el gracioso conmigo, Arbitrator, y lo pondré a fregar las cubiertas inferiores. ¿Ha quedado claro?».

languages.text: “听好了，法务官，你要是再敢和我耍小聪明，我就让你去擦洗底层甲板。听懂了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “听好了，法务官，你要是再敢和我耍小聪明，我就让你去擦洗底层甲板。听懂了吗？”

languages.text: "O kuş beyninle huzurumda bir daha ukalalık edersen sana alt güverteleri yalatırım. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Parade your wit before me again, Arbitrator, and I'll have you swabbing the lower decks. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "O kuş beyninle huzurumda bir daha ukalalık edersen sana alt güverteleri yalatırım. Anlaşıldı mı?"
